pkgmetadata.longdescription: Script Collection=================Various scripts which were useful during my PhD... image:: https://readthedocs.org/projects/rad-tools/badge/?version=stable :target: https://rad-tools.adrybakov.com/en/stable/?badge=stable :alt: Documentation Status.. image:: https://img.shields.io/badge/code%20style-black-000000.svg :target: https://github.com/psf/blackInstallation------------First make sure that you have python3 and pip installed.Then execute the following in your terminal:.. code-block:: console pip install rad-toolsDocumentation=============Documentations is available `here. <https://rad-tools.adrybakov.com>`_
